thread.title: Matt Gleason
thread.title_full: Olympique Lyonnais Boutique Officielle évalué par Matt Gleason

author: Matt Gleason
title: Matt Gleason
text: Received my order from OL and it's missing both the shorts that I purchase and the jersey I bought is missing the Ligue 1 badge that I paid for. I'm emailed customer service now 3 times with no response and it's been a week. I'm extremely unhappy and will now contact my credit card company since OL doesn't want to help fix their screwup.
